import React from 'react' import { Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionItemButton, AccordionItemHeading, AccordionItemPanel } from 'react-accessible-accordion'; const WEEK_DAYS = [ 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday' ]; const Forecast = ({ data }) => { const dayInAWeek = new Date().getDay(); const forecastDays = WEEK_DAYS.slice(dayInAWeek, WEEK_DAYS.length) .concat(WEEK_DAYS.slice(0, dayInAWeek) ); // console.log(forecastDays) // console.log(dataInAWeek) return ( <> {/*

{console.log("$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$")}

{console.log(data)}

{console.log("$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$")}

*/} {data.list.splice(0, 7).map((item, idx) => (
))} ) } export default Forecast;
